articles.description: As housing prices soar, owning a home in the U.S. "is a signifier of the upper class now," one real estate economist says.
articles.content: Home prices across the U.S. are surging, while a shortage of houses for sale has resulted in cut-throat competition for those in the market to buy a property. That confluence of trends has taken the … [+8588 chars]

articles.author: Dave Jamieson
articles.title: Starbucks Tries To Slow Union Elections But Misses Legal Deadline By 8 Minutes - HuffPost
articles.description: The coffee chain's legal team said Microsoft Outlook crashed as it was emailing the files. A labor board official didn't have much sympathy.
articles.content:
Starbucks employees and supporters react as votes are read during a union election watch party on Dec. 9, 2021, in Buffalo, New York.
